scripts.build: npx esbuild src/demo.ts src/conditional-page.ts src/conditional0.ts src/marginal-page.ts src/1d.ts src/flow-matching.ts src/vf-page.ts src/sde-page.ts src/score.ts src/framework.ts --bundle --outdir=dist
scripts.watch: npx esbuild src/demo.ts src/conditional-page.ts src/conditional0.ts src/marginal-page.ts src/1d.ts src/flow-matching.ts src/vf-page.ts src/sde-page.ts src/score.ts src/framework.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --watch
